notes: Stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal.
Cannot lifesteal off of wards, buildings and allied units.
abilities.description: Heals the attacker for 18% of attack damage dealt. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50%

name: Morbid Mask
description: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
trivia: In DotA, this item was called Mask of Death.
